availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Union County, Tennessee, farmer. Tennessee native. Father of Almarinda Wolfenbarger, Alfred T. Wolfenbarger, Alfred T. Wolfenbarger, Caroline J. Wolfenbarger, John W. Wolfenbarger, Elizabeth M. Wolfenbarger. Married to Elizabeth Wolfenbarger. Farmer in Grainger County, Tennessee in 1850. Farmer in Union County, Tennessee in 1860. Juror in the State V. William B. Chapman in 1861.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Grainger County, District 14, p. 245. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Union County, District 1, p. 427. Find A Grave, "Robert W. Wolfenbarger (February 6, 1822-May 5, 1896)," Memorial #5256649, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/5256649 (accessed January 30, 2020). KYR-0001-021-0031.
